General.Name: Fermentalg S.A.
General.Description: Fermentalg SA develops, produces, and sells active ingredients extracted from microalgae for the food, health, nutrition, and environment sectors in France and internationally. It offers DHA ORIGINS, a plant-based DHA oil; aquafeeds and pet foods; BLUE ORIGIN, a natural color; and environmental and clean air solutions that captures CO2 in industries. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Libourne, France.
